Title: Relates to assisting contractors to identify minority group members and women for hiring opportunities
Summary: Assists contractors in identifying minority group members and women who are participating in apprenticeship agreements.
LawCode: Amd ยง311, Exec L; amd ยง811, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the labor law, in relation to assisting contractors to identify minority group members and women for hiring opportunities
